title: Kim Kardashian West in the Adidas Velour Tracksuit

organizations.name: adidas velour tracksuit kim kardashian west pulls

text: Kim Kardashian West Pulls a Cozy Chic Look From Her Early Aughts Wardrobe February 7, 2017 1:57 PM by Edward Barsamian Photo: AKM-GSI Once upon a time, you could walk down Melrose Avenue and see that legions of fashion-forward women had swapped out their Chanel bouclé for Juicy Couture velour . And last night in West Hollywood, Kim Kardashian West revisited that comfy early aughts moment while out to dinner with her sister Kourtney . Since the start of 2017, Kardashian West has taken a new approach to her everyday wardrobe, one focused on throwback staples with a high-fashion edge—think slinky, ’70s-inspired dresses paired with dad hats , grungy jeans with fur toppers , and ’80s power-shoulder jackets . This latest look had its own throwback vibe thanks to the tracksuit, and was taken up a notch via an oversize trenchcoat, a piece she first wore at Balenciaga’s show . Her tailored hoodie was tucked into form-fitting trousers with a tapered finish, allowing her bronzed boots to give the ensemble a hint of shine. Kim Kardashian and Kanye West's Behind-the-Scenes Video From Their April Cover Shoot: In This Story: Kim Kardashian West Recommended For You
